p: The leaves of A. americana were collected in February 2018 in Addis Ababa, and plant identification and authentication was done with the help of local floras. The specimen was preserved in the Addis Ababa University herbarium with a voucher number of 064988. Fresh leaves of A. americana were dried under a shed and powdered with a mechanical grinder. The powder was then passed through a sieve with sieve No. 40 and stored in an airtight container until extraction.
